description:
The Insect Magistrate heads to Kishuu to recover her lost powers.  Oooka Tadasuke, Edo`s smartest man, accompanies her as her guard.  Jinbei goes as well, but Oooka is upset by his failings as a Samurai.  And then Nezu Jinpachi, one of the 10 Crucifix Insects, appears!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cool na Megane no Marubatsu Kouza
The Cool Guy in Glasses Lectures on Right and Wrong
クールなメガネの○×講座
